data.title: Cosmetic Dentist in Denver, Co
data.meta_description: Welcome to Denver Place Dentistry! We offer high-quality cosmetic dentistry and restorative dentistry. Visit our site and make an appointment now!
data.text:
Dental Office in Denver

A Smile with Style

Now Open FRIDAYS from 8:00 AM – 2:00 PM

Meet the Dentists

Skilled Professionals

At Denver Place Dentistry, our friendly team is committed to providing you with advanced and gentle care. We offer general dentistry services including emergency dental care, cosmetic dentistry services including Invisalign and Veneers, and even specialized services such as wisdom teeth extractions and dental implant restorations – all in one familiar place! How can we make you smile today?

Gary Radz, DDS

Joshua Klein, DDS

Our Services

Whatever You Need, We’re Here to Help

Welcome to Denver’s best in oral care. We work to ensure that our patients feel comfortable and confident that they receive the best that dentistry has to offer. Denver Place Dentistry in downtown Denver offers advanced, comprehensive dental care to take care of you and your family in a relaxed, friendly, and judgement-free environment. We only use the latest technology and treatment methods to provide you with the most convenient and efficient dental care. With our wide-ranging services we rarely have to refer patients out of our office.

COSMETIC DENTISTRY

Cosmetic dentistry treatments exist to enhance the appearance of one’s smile but also to improve the function of your mouth, teeth and gums.

EMERGENCY DENTISTRY

Dental emergencies happen at random and can affect your ability to carry out your daily routine. We understand that emergencies are uncontrollable, which is why we offer same day emergency appointments.

Invisalign

Clear aligners are an effective alternative to traditional braces, because they use a system of clear, removable trays used to straighten teeth.

Preventive Dentistry

Preventive dentistry focuses on the treatments and practices that help people prevent oral disease or other dental problems.

Restorative Dentistry

Restorative dentistry serves to restore teeth that may have been damaged through common oral health problems or more serious dental issues.

Scheduling a visit

We Look Forward to Seeing You

Denver Place Dentistry proudly serves the Downtown Denver community as well as the neighborhoods of Highland, Capitol Hill, City Park, and Cherry Creek. We are welcoming new patients and would be thrilled to meet you. Our premier dental office is conveniently located in the South Tower of Denver Place at the corner of 18th St and Champa St.

Office Location

999 18th St, Suite 1300

Denver, CO 80202

[email protected]

(303) 298-1414

Testimonials

Don’t Take Our Word, See What Others Are Saying

4.8

Based on 273 reviews

Jeremiah Hagen

15:47 14 Oct 22

Switched dentist offices to Denver Place Dentistry for convenient proximity to my office. Had an old filling... re-filled. Two-weeks later it was still sensitive so I popped in the office unannounced. Within 5 minutes I was sitting in a chair and Dr. Radz was sanding down the filling. Two days later, pain-free bite! Pretty cool they are willing to perform impromptu. 5 stars.read more

heather phillips

18:37 28 Sep 22

Everyone was friendly and efficient. It was a first/new patient consultation, so haven't had any work done yet, but my... interactions with the team were very reassuring. Everyone was knowledgeable and professional and that place ran like clockwork!read more

Sherry Rowan

17:44 27 Sep 22

I had my first visit to Denver Place Dentistry and am so happy with my decision to choose them for my dental care.... Everyone was so friendly and accommodating. My questions and concerns were all addressed in an informative and respectful manner. I look forward to continued care at DPD!read more

Joe Bartelheim

19:36 24 Sep 22

I have been a patient with Denver Place Dentistry for many years and always receive the best of care and service from... the excellent front office staff and the medical team. I recently had oral surgery (extraction and implant) with Dr. Kissinger and his surgical assistant Beca who were superb. The procedure was well planned and went very well. Post operative pain is manageable with Advil and there has been only minor swelling. If you are searching for a practice for your oral care DPD is one of the best!read more

Lana Jern

21:39 15 Aug 22

This was my first visit to this practice. From the first phone call through the checkout on my first visit, it was a... totally positive experience. I have a background in dental practice management and I was impressed with the entire staff. They excel in great communication, up-to-date technology and they top it off with extreme professionalism. This practice has figured it out and this is my new home for my dental needs!! Excellence in action!!read more

Joan Smith

15:10 15 Aug 22

I have been receiving dental services at Denver Place Dentistry for fifteen years, and every visit is a positive... experience. The staff are friendly and helpful, providing me with all the information I need to make informed choices about my dental care. The hygienists are friendly, considerate and thorough, leaving me with beautifully clean teeth after every dental cleaning. Drs. Radz, Kissinger and Thompson provide thoughtful, gentle care to maintain my highest degree of oral health. I highly recommend this practice for its professionalism in delivering high-quality, professional oral health services.read more

Dan Kieu

17:10 20 Jul 22

Great place to get dental care. Competitive pricing, friendly faces, and cutting edge dental tech. They’ve never done... me wrong.read more

Joel K.

18:48 13 Jul 22

I am among Gary's first patients; seeing him since '99 when his Denver practice opened on the 2nd floor. He helped... complete a difficult crown for me that another dentist had started. He gave me incredible attention--giving me his personal phone number in case I needed it and meeting me in his office on a Saturday morning to be sure my crown was right! His new office is beautiful and scenic; old and new downtown Denver. You are definitely in good care with this practice and you can count on them for good advice with your questions.read more

m rubio

17:55 17 Jun 22

24yrs of fantastic care and service. Wouldn't go anywhere else. Leah, Andrea and Dr. Radz have always provided... wonderful care!read more

E Myers

21:01 06 May 22

I don't live or work downtown. In fact, I can't think of a less convenient dentist location from my house. But we... still go here, because they're that good. My wife and I have been a patients of Dr. Radz for 14 years. The man and his staff are legendary.read more

Amy Noble

18:10 30 Apr 22

Absolutely love this dentist. All the hygienists are so lovely and really perishable. Makes my cleaning experience even... more worthwhile. The doctors are great too, very professional and kind. Very clean and nice office. Definitely recommend this place.read more

Darrel Waggener

15:22 22 Apr 22

My daughter referred me and I’m so glad she did. The office is impressive and the doctors and staff even more so. ... They are experienced, knowledgeable, and professional, but just as important they are warm, friendly, and caring. I whole heartedly recommend them.read more

Keith Swinehart

02:19 22 Apr 22

You can count on excellent customer service and professional attention. The evaluation and repair skills are... exceptional....that includes the hygienists.You get a lot of quality service from this team..read more

Gabriel Quintero

00:19 12 Mar 22

Good service from the start to finish. Lots of X-rays to where the even have the standing x-ray machine. No complaints... and the cleaning was awesome!read more

Aaron Maas

10:49 19 Jan 22

Great trip to the dentist all around! Very friendly staff, and quick checkup

Erik Faust

17:31 24 Dec 21

Love this dentist. They speak candidly with their patients and I never feel like they’re trying to sell me on anything.... I actually live out of state and visit this dentist whenever I come back to visit family. Professional, courteous, and respectful of my time and money: what more could anyone ask for.read more

deborah sheard

19:08 02 Dec 21

Dr Radz provided excellent care as did his hygienist. He took time to explain & explore my options for future needs. I... felt comfortable and well informed.read more

Larry D Mudgett

16:07 25 Nov 21

I would highly recommend Denver Place Dentistry for any, or all teeth related issues! The staff is very friendly,... courteous and professional.read more

Anthony Gentile

17:39 18 Nov 21

The staff was very helpful getting me a new patient appointment the following day even though it was towards the end of... the year and they were busy. I was able to speak with one of the dentist's who was very helpful and set me up with referrals and recommendations for additional work needing to be done.read more

Jeff Reeser

17:00 18 Nov 21

Dr Radz and his team are best in town, and I’ve tried many over the course of many decades in Colorado. They are... efficient, very precise and friendly.read more

Diana Metz

15:36 17 Nov 21

Like many others, I’ve never been a big fan of going to the dentist. However, Dr. Radz and his team have been fantastic... at ensuring that I’m comfortable and knowledgeable about every procedure they do. Jahida and Marie do a great job of making one feel at ease and sharing tips for better dental hygiene. Karissa is always so sweet and welcoming whenever I come in. Overall, the entire staff is super professional and will undoubtedly provide you with exceptional care.read more

John Miller

16:40 22 Oct 21

Dr Radz has been in prominent Colorado dentist for many years. And, I have been a patient at Denver Place Dentistry for... many years. Consistently over that time Dr Radz has carefully formed a team of very competent professionals at every level: He and his partners, dental hygienists and administrative staff. All have been superb.read more

Mark Fox

17:41 02 Oct 21

Always a pleasure to see Dr. Radz, Dr. Kissinger, Leah (dental hygienist), Marie and J (dental assistants for my crown... replacement PLUS new temporary crown this week), Andrea (administrative extraordinaire) and all the friendly staff at Denver Place Dentistry. I wouldn’t trust my teeth with any other dentistry team! For the eight years I’ve been a patient of Dr. Radz and his team, they have never disappointed.read more

Edra Pollin

16:35 29 Sep 21

I've been to numerous dentists over the years and Dr. Radz is hands down the best dentist of them all. His office... environment and staff is professional, friendly, competent and considerate. I've been a patient of Dr. Radz for several years now and I always leave his office with a big smile on my face.:)read more

William Loper

04:28 27 Sep 21

I've been a patient of Dr. Radz for 22 years. Since I was a child, I was always afraid to go to the dentist. In 1999, ... I interviewed dentist offices to see which ones provided laughing gas to help calm me down while in the chair.I have never needed that gas, never, with Dr. Radz.There is much to be said for feeling safe and comfortable.The office staff is friendly, courteous, and professional; that has always been the case.Although Denver Place Dentistry is not in my network for insurance, it is well worth it to me for the incredible personable service I receive there.read more

Peggy Johnson

18:24 17 Sep 21

Dr Radz is the absolute best at his job and he cares.His staff is the same. I would highly recommend this dental care... to everyone.I would never go anywhere else!!!!read more

Jane Kaplan

17:22 31 Aug 21

I have complete confidence in Dr. RADZ. He is an excellent cosmetic dentist. I was referred to him by my dentist in... New York, also an excellent cosmetic dentist. He heard I was moving to Colorado and immediately said “I know an incredibly skilled dentist in Denver you must see”. I have invested a lot of money in my teeth and feel confident that I am getting the best continued care with Dr RADZ. He is not cheap! But I am willing to pay for good care. I gave him four stars only because of the cost and because his dental assistant is less than friendly, though certainly polite. That may not matter to most people, but it does to me! As far care and skill, I don’t think there is anyone better than Dr RADZ.read more

Stephen Alderete

17:50 22 Jul 21

Exceptional service from entering, to my exam, to a detailed explanation from Dr Kissinger and then back to reception... before departing from my appointment! Nothing but professionalism from everyone involved with my visit. Thank you all for making my visit like a welcoming me into your home/family!read more

Nena Solis

23:31 08 Jul 21

I was referred here by a good friend. I haven't had a dentist that I have felt confident in in years. I have found my... family's new dentist office! Dr. Kissinger and Marie are amazing and truly talented:) thank you!!!read more

Jason Fernandes

17:27 08 Jul 21

Have been going here for a few years. Dr. Radz and the entire staff are great. Appointments are always on time, and... quick but thorough. Removing one star because they do seem to be at a higher price point than most dentist offices.read more

James Johnson

16:21 30 Jun 21

I was a first time patient and the experience was top notch. I am a pretty nervous patient and everyone was very kind... and understanding. Highly recommended!read more

Carolyn Simpson-Struble

16:59 25 Jun 21

Denver Place Dentistry fit us in while my daughter & I were traveling through Denver. Friendly, professional staff & a... beautiful office space. Dr. Kissinger is fantastic. If I ever move to Denver, I'm going to become a patient here!read more

Sandra Singer

19:32 15 May 21

I have seen Dr. Gary Radz for about 15 years, and he is THE BEST!! He has done a crown and a number of veneers for me,... and his work is absolutely beautiful. He is also an incredibly nice person, and funny, too! I can't recommend him enough!! ❤read more

Jeanne A

10:33 15 Apr 21

Great dentists, great staff. Dr. Radz is one of, if not the best dentist in Denver. His office uses the latest and most... effective technology. His advanced skills in cosmetic dentistry can give anyone with problematic teeth the most stunning smile. Get your confidence back and visit Dr. Radz. You’ll be glad you did.read more

Michael Schlueter

18:41 07 Apr 21

Dr. Radz and his staff have seen to my dental needs for over twenty years. I completely trust his advice, and all... procedures he has undertaken or referred to specialists have been successful. Highest recommendation.read more

Shen Smith

17:46 31 Mar 21

Great team, great results! It is clear that Dr Radz and his staff care very much about their patients. They take their... time to make sure everything is fully explained, and all questions are answered. The work is done meticulously, gently, and with purpose. If perfectionism is what you demand, this is the practice for you!read more

Tasha Eurich

16:34 30 Mar 21

Dr. Radz and his team are wonderful at what they do, and so kind. I always find myself having way more than fun at the... dentist than I would ever predict! 😂🙏 Thank you for your exceptional care over the years.read more

Suzana Palasti

23:08 30 Jan 21

Dr. Kissinger explained everything in a precise but easy to understand manner. As a patient I greatly appreciated this... because it comforted me throughout my implant procedure. I highly recommend Dr. Kissinger for any type of dental work!read more

Susan Lapointe

16:03 20 Jan 21

Always a pleasure. Professional and personable. Dr Radz is wonderful.

Lucky Lee

17:22 28 Dec 20

My experience with this dental office was excellent! The staff was all very efficient, caring and pleasant. The offices... are very comfortable, clean and beautiful. Dr. Kissinger was amazing! Very professional and knowledgeable. He took the time to listen to my problem and explain what was going on and how it could be remedied. He was very caring and accommodating to fix the problem. I highly recommend this dental practice - far superior to any other!read more
